name: Ancient charm
description:
This is an ancient style jigsaw puzzle game that allows players to enjoy the charm of ancient Chinese women during the jigsaw puzzle game. At the end of the game, there will be a corresponding album for players to collect.

Game Features:
1.An ancient beauty CG puzzle with 10 different characteristics
2, 10 corresponding characters unlock picture album CG
3. Each round of the puzzle is not limited in time and can be withdrawn at any time.
4. Each puzzle is completed to unlock the corresponding antique style beauty painting set
5. Each time you enter a different puzzle level, the screen will randomly position
